    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        public CompletableFuture<Void> lock()
        Acquires the lock.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed once the lock has been acquired.

      • tryLock

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> tryLock()
        Acquires the lock if it's free.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with a boolean indicating whether the lock was acquired.

      • tryLock

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> tryLock(long time)
        Acquires the lock if it's free within the given timeout.
        Parameters:
        time - The time within which to acquire the lock in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with a boolean indicating whether the lock was acquired.

      • tryLock

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> tryLock(long time,
                                          TimeUnit unit)
        Acquires the lock if it's free within the given timeout.
        Parameters:
        time - The time within which to acquire the lock.
        unit - The time unit.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with a boolean indicating whether the lock was acquired.

      • unlock

        public CompletableFuture<Void> unlock()
        Releases the lock.
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed once the lock has been released.
